name: Google Mario
description:
This is a Super Mario theme for the Google home page and the Google search results page.
Experimented on the Google search results page to have a fixed search header

user.name: Jessica Gardner
user.about:
I am a UI/UX Designer. I specialize in updating outdated user interfaces as well as designing new ones. I focus on the usability and user interaction aspect of design which you will soon see as I upload some of my work. I design best with HTML, CSS, CSS3, jQuery. I also work well in JavaScript and AngularJS

I live in St. Louis MO, I am open to do website design or web app design remotely. I am also able to design desktop applications using WPF

additional_info:
9-18-2017: Updated the search bar on Google search results page to not show a white box. Also added a box shadow on the fixed search results page so it appears raised. Lastly I highlighted the "View Saved" for image search so the user can see clearly where they can access their saved images.

9-11-2017: Updated the Google logo to only target the main logo area and not other image areas of the screen. Updated the tools button on the search results page to be the same size and have the same hover style as the other buttons.
